thread.title: Chuck Brewer, Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate
thread.title_full: Chuck Brewer, Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate

title: Chuck Brewer, Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate
text: Chuck Brewer, Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate Buy Photo Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate Chuck Brewer, 44, is shown in Soupremacy, 7 E. Market St., one of two Downtown restaurants he owns, on Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. This is the first run for political office for Brewer, a former Marine. Charlie Nye / The Star Fullscreen Buy Photo Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate Chuck Brewer, 44, talks to employees of SRAM, a bicycle component company located at 5315 Walt Pl., Indianapolis, on Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. He conducted a Q&A and then toured the Northwestside facility. A former Marine and an Indianapolis businessman who owns two restaurants Downtown, Brewer is running for political office for the first time. Charlie Nye / The Star Fullscreen Buy Photo Republican Indianapolis mayoral candidate Chuck Brewer, 44, talks to employees of SRAM, a bicycle component company located at 5315 Walt Pl., Indianapolis, on Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. He conducted a Q&A and then toured the Northwestside facility. A former Marine and an Indianapolis businessman who owns two restaurants Downtown, Brewer is running for political office for the first time. He conducted a Q&A and then toured the Northwestside facility. A former Marine and an Indianapolis businessman who owns two restaurants Downtown, Brewer is running for political office for the first time. A former Marine and an Indianapolis businessman who owns two restaurants Downtown, Brewer is running for political office for the first time.
